4,Complete Purchase Process for Google Pixel 7 Pro,"Navigate to the homepage, select Google Pixel 7 Pro, purchase the item, fill out shipping details, and complete the order.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link GooglePixel -> Navigate to page 'product category page#*/*'
Step 3: Click on link GooglePixel7Pro -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 4: Click on button purchase (Increased)
Step 5: Click on button purchase (Buy)
Step 6: Click on link PlaceAnOrder -> Navigate to page 'cart#cart'
Step 7: Click on button IncreaseQuantity
Step 8: Fill out shipping information and continue to payment step

column2: - Step 1: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout info#checkout/info'

- Step 3: Enter input value in input Email

- Step 5: Click on input FirstName
- Step 6: Enter input value in input FirstName

- Step 10: Enter input value in input Address

- Step 12: Enter input value in input ZipCode

- Step 14: Enter input value in input City
- Step 15: Click on input State
- Step 16: Enter input value in input State
- Step 17: Click on input Phone
- Step 18: Enter input value in input Phone
- Step 19: Click on button ContinueToPayment

5,Complete Purchase Process for iPhone 15 Plus,Navigate to the homepage, select iPhone 15 Plus, choose storage options, purchase the item, fill out shipping details, and complete the order.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category#category/*'
Step 3: Click on link iPhone15Plus -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 4: Click on label storageColorOptions (Storage128GB)
Step 5: Click on label storageColorOptions (ColorBlue)
Step 6: Click on button purchase (Increased)
Step 7: Click on link PlaceAnOrder
Step 8: Fill out shipping information and continue to payment step
